laazotea.indi.driver

Class INDIElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.driver.INDIElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    INDIBLOBElement, INDILightElement, INDINumberElement, INDISwitchElement, INDITextElement

    public abstract class INDIElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing a INDI Element. The subclasses INDIBLOBElement, INDILightElement, INDINumberElement, INDISwitchElement and INDITextElement define the basic Elements that a INDI Property may contain according to the INDI protocol.
    Version:
    1.32, July 23, 2013
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

           java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String label)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs an instance of INDIElement. Called by its sub-classes. If the label is null, the name is assigned to the label.
        Parameters:
        property - The Property to which this Element belongs.
        name - The name of the Element
        label - The label of the Element
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the name * is null.
